cover_photo.description:
We did a short road trip to the Dolomites (5hrs driving). We stopped the car almost every 5 meters because of the beautiful landscape. 
It reminded me to take the time and appreciate what is around you.
cover_photo.alt_description: body of water and snow-covered mountains during daytime
